titleStmt.title: Two speeches of George Earl of Bristol with some observations upon them by which it may appear whether or no the said Earl deserve to be involved in the common calamity brought upon Roman Catholicks, by the folly and presumption of some few factious papists.
Speeches. Selections
titleStmt.author: Bristol, George Digby, Earl of, 1612-1677.

notesStmt.note: Page 9-12 are cropped with some loss of print
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
